dk.pervasive.jcaf.scap
Class SCAPRequestHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      dk.pervasive.jcaf.scap.SCAPRequestHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class SCAPRequestHandler
extends java.lang.Thread

This class handles SCAP Requests. It is able to handle multiple SCAP calls on one socket. When the socket is closed by the client, or if any other IOException occurs while talking to the client, this SCAP Request Handler thread is stopped.

Author:
Jakob E. Bardram

Create a SCAP Request Handler that listens to SCAP request on the specified socket
